exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="resource/assets/Button/button_up.png"
             source.down="resource/assets/Button/button_down.png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma 'Microsoft Yahei'"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="resource/assets/CheckBox/checkbox_unselect.png"
                 source.upAndSelected="resource/assets/CheckBox/checkbox_select_up.png"
                 source.downAndSelected="resource/assets/CheckBox/checkbox_select_down.png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="resource/assets/CheckBox/checkbox_select_disabled.png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="resource/assets/ScrollBar/roundthumb.png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="resource/assets/Slider/track.png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="resource/assets/Slider/thumb.png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="resource/assets/Panel/border.png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="resource/assets/Panel/header.png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Group id="contentGroup" width="100%" top="50" bottom="30"/>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="resource/assets/ProgressBar/track.png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="resource/assets/ProgressBar/thumb.png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="resource/assets/RadioButton/radiobutton_unselect.png"
                 source.upAndSelected="resource/assets/RadioButton/radiobutton_select_up.png"
                 source.downAndSelected="resource/assets/RadioButton/radiobutton_select_down.png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="resource/assets/RadioButton/radiobutton_select_disabled.png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="resource/assets/ToggleSwitch/on.png"
             source.up="resource/assets/ToggleSwitch/off.png"
             source.down="resource/assets/ToggleSwitch/off.png"
             source.disabled="resource/assets/ToggleSwitch/off.png"/>
    <e:Image source="resource/assets/ToggleSwitch/handle.png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="resource/assets/ScrollBar/roundthumb.png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="resource/assets/Slider/track.png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="resource/assets/Slider/thumb.png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.ActivityBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"
	        
	         width.down="90%" height.down="90%" width.disabled="90%" height.disabled="90%" width.up="100%" x.disabled="6" y.disabled="6" width="100%" x.down="6" y.down="6" source="activityBtn_png" source.down="activityBtn_png"/>
	<e:Label italic="true" textColor="0x2EFF00" text="标签" verticalCenter="0" size="24" width="110" x="20" id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" y="20" horizontalCenter="0" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.KaiFuBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"
	         
	         width.down="90%" height.down="90%" width.disabled="90%" height.disabled="90%" width.up="100%" x.disabled="6" y.disabled="6" width="100%" x.down="6" y.down="6" source="activityBtn_png" source.disabled="kaiFuBtn_png" source.up="kaiFuBtn_png" source.down="kaiFuBtn_png"/>
	<e:Label italic="true" textColor="0x2EFF00" text="标签" verticalCenter="0" size="24" width="110" x="30" id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" y="30" horizontalCenter="0" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.InfoBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"
	         
	         width.down="90%" height.down="90%" width.disabled="90%" height.disabled="90%" width.up="100%" x.disabled="6" y.disabled="6" width="100%" x.down="6" y.down="6" source="infoBtn_png" source.up="infoBtn_png" source.down="infoBtn_png" source.disabled="infoBtn_png"/>
	<e:Label italic="true" textColor="0x2EFF00" text="标签" verticalCenter="0" size="24" width="110" x="40" id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" y="40" horizontalCenter="0" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ActivityBarSkin" width="120" height="550" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="shuImg_png" x="18" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Button id="activityBtn" label="待续" x="4" y="128" skinName="main.ActivityBtnSkin"/>
	<e:Button id="kaiFuBtn" label="待续" x="4" y="266" skinName="main.KaiFuBtnSkin"/>
	<e:Button id="infoBtn" label="待续" x="4" y="403" skinName="main.InfoBtnSkin"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.RoleBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"
	        
	         width.down="90%" height.down="90%" width.disabled="90%" height.disabled="90%" width.up="100%" x.disabled="6" y.disabled="6" width="100%" x.down="6" y.down="6" source="roleBtn_png" source.down="roleBtn_png" source.disabled="roleBtn_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="标签" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="100" textAlign="center" textColor="0x2EFF00" bold="true" italic="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.BackpackBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"
	        
	         width.down="90%" height.down="90%" width.disabled="90%" height.disabled="90%" width.up="100%" x.disabled="6" y.disabled="6" width="100%" x.down="6" y.down="6" source="backpackBtn_png" source.down="backpackBtn_png"/>
	<e:Label italic="true" id="labelDisplay" textColor="0x2EFF00" text="标签" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" width="110" verticalCenter="0" bold="true" x="10" y="10" size="24"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.QianghuaBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"
	        
	         width.down="90%" height.down="90%" width.disabled="90%" height.disabled="90%" width.up="100%" x.disabled="6" y.disabled="6" width="100%" x.down="6" y.down="6" source="qianghuaBtn_png" source.down="qianghuaBtn_png"/>
	<e:Label y="20" textColor="0x2EFF00" text="标签" textAlign="center" id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" width="110" verticalCenter="0" bold="true" x="20" size="24" italic="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.ZhaoXianBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"

	<e:Label italic="true" id="labelDisplay" textColor="0x2EFF00" text="标签" textAlign="center" y="30" horizontalCenter="0" width="100" verticalCenter="0" bold="true" x="30"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.ChuangDangBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"

	<e:Label italic="true" y="40" textColor="0x2EFF00" text="标签" textAlign="center" id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" width="100" verticalCenter="0" bold="true" x="40"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.ShopBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.MapBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"

	<e:Label italic="true" y="60" textColor="0x2EFF00" text="标签" textAlign="center" id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" width="100" verticalCenter="0" bold="true" x="60"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="FunctionBarSkin" width="900" height="120" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="hengImg_png" x="32" y="21"/>
	<e:Button id="roleBtn" label="Excel" x="34" y="6" skinName="main.RoleBtnSkin" enabled="true"/>
	<e:Button id="backpackBtn" label="prox数据存取" x="153" y="6" skinName="main.BackpackBtnSkin"/>
	<e:Button id="qianghuaBtn" label="protobuf演示" x="273" y="6" skinName="main.QianghuaBtnSkin"/>
	<e:Button id="zhaoXianBtn" label="按钮特效" x="392" y="6" skinName="main.ZhaoXianBtnSkin"/>
	<e:Button id="chuangDangBtn" x="511" y="6" skinName="main.ChuangDangBtnSkin" label="面板特效"/>
	<e:Button id="shopBtn" label="图片特效" x="631" y="6" skinName="main.ShopBtnSkin"/>
	<e:Button id="mapBtn" label="提示特效" x="750" y="6" skinName="main.MapBtnSkin"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="main.MainBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.up="112" width.down="112" height.down="112" width.disabled="112" height.disabled="112" height.up="112">
	<e:Image height="100%"
	        
	         width.down="90%" height.down="90%" width.disabled="90%" height.disabled="90%" width.up="100%" x.disabled="6" y.disabled="6" width="100%" x.down="6" y.down="6" source="mainBtn_png" source.down="mainBtn_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RoleInfoSkin" width="600" height="120" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="roleInfoImg_png" x="0" y="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MainUISkin" width="1280" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:game="game.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<game:ActivityBar id="activityBar" x="1151" y="319" skinName="ActivityBarSkin"/>
	<game:FunctionBar id="functionBar" x="291" y="832" skinName="FunctionBarSkin"/>
	<e:Button id="mainBtn" label="按钮" x="1157" y="836" skinName="main.MainBtnSkin"/>
	<game:RoleInfo id="roleInfo" x="0" y="0" skinName="RoleInfoSkin"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ScoreboardSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  width="236" height="112">
	<w:Config id="1708571970e" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="prefab_png" alpha="0.8" y="-262.78" x="-161.33" width="812" height="375" visible="false"/>
	<e:Image source="bghuizuo_png"/>
	<e:Image x="5" y="41" source="blackPoint_png"/>
	<e:Image x="5" y="5" source="redPoint_png"/>
	<e:Image x="5" y="78" source="otherPoint_png"/>
	<e:Label id="wpRed_lab" text="0%" y="28.2" textColor="0xd59464" size="7" horizontalCenter="-102"/>
	<e:Label id="wpBlack_lab" text="0%" y="67" textColor="0xD59464" size="7" horizontalCenter="-102"/>
	<e:Label id="wpOther_lab" text="0%" y="101" textColor="0xD59464" size="7" horizontalCenter="-102"/>
	<e:Group id="board_group" width="200.34" height="99.8" x="30.66" y="6" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout orientation="columns" verticalGap="4.5" requestedRowCount="6" requestedColumnCount="10" paddingLeft="4.3" paddingTop="4.2" horizontalGap="8.1"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="BallBtnSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" width="32" height="33">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="line">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{line_img}">
				<tween:To duration="1000">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object scaleY="{1.3}" scaleX="{1.3}" alpha="{0.2}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
    <e:Image scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             source.down="button_down_png" source="0.1_png" includeIn="up,disabled"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="line_img" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="goldenLain_png" anchorOffsetX="15" anchorOffsetY="15" x="16" y="16.25" width="30" height="30" visible="false"/>

	<w:Config id="1707f1bb835" ></w:Config>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ClockSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  width="25" height="25">
	<w:Config id="17085cefa1b" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image source="timer_png"/>
	<e:Label id="surplusTime_lab" text="25" size="13.3" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0.5"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RegionRedSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*"  width="339" height="288">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="showLine">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{line_img}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<w:Config id="1707f8b9d93" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image id="line_img" source="regionUpLine_png" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" right="0" alpha="0"/>
	<e:Image id="win_img" source="win_png" horizontalCenter="6.5" verticalCenter="0" alpha="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="RegionBlackSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*"  width="377" height="399">
	<w:Declarations>
		<tween:TweenGroup id="showLine">
			<tween:TweenItem target="{line_img}">
				<tween:Set>
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
	<w:Config id="1707f8b9d93" ></w:Config>

						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:Set>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{1}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
				<tween:To duration="350">
					<tween:props>
						<e:Object alpha="{0}"/>
					</tween:props>
				</tween:To>
			</tween:TweenItem>
		</tween:TweenGroup>
	</w:Declarations>
